content: I cannot predict the future. however, the transition to renewable energy sources has been gaining momentum as people become more aware of the impacts of burning fossil fuels. there are significant challenges to overcome in terms of energy storage, grid infrastructure, and political will to support a transition to renewable energy sources. however, many experts believe that a combination of alternative energy sources, energy efficiency measures, and the electrification of transportation could eventually lead to a future where we rely less and less on non-renewable energy sources. it will depend on how quickly we can make progress in these areas, but the ultimate goal is to achieve a sustainable and environmentally friendly energy system.
